summary.para: Creates a delta package from the differences in the updated package and the baseline package.

param.name: updatedPackageStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the updated app package.

param.name: baselinePackageStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the baseline app package.

param.name: deltaPackageStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the delta (difference) app package.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Creates a delta package from the differences in the updated package and the baseline block map.

param.name: updatedPackageStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the updated app package.

param.name: baselineBlockMapStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the baseline block map.

param.name: baselinePackageFullName
param.para: The full name of the baseline app package.

param.name: deltaPackageStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the delta (difference) app package.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: baselineEncryptedPackageStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the baseline encrypted app package.

param.name: deltaPackageStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the delta (difference) app package.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: baselinePackageStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the baseline app package.

param.name: deltaPackageStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the delta (difference) app package.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: packageStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the app package associated with the manifest to be updated.

param.name: updatedManifestStream
param.para: An that provides the contents of the updated app package manifest.

param.name: isPackageEncrypted
param.para: Flag to specify whether the package is encrypted.

param.name: options
param.para: Options for app package manifest validation.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides functionality to edit app packages.
